Here is the part about the settings.
Here you can customize your experience,: Here you can customize your experience, you can:
Change your profile (your name, descript: Change your profile (your name, description, profile picture, banner ...)
Manage social relations (Report users, b: Manage social relations (Report users, block users)
Manage informations like your language o: Manage informations like your language or notifications
Here is the part about the Shop.
To buy items in the shop, you must have: To buy items in the shop, you must have coins. You can get these coins by playing flag fight in multiplayer.
There is 3 differents things that you ca: There is 3 differents things that you can do it the Shop:
In flag fight, you can buy flags and try: In flag fight, you can buy flags and try to collect them all. But in addition to that, you can choose to represent any flag you have purchased by putting it on your profile.
In flag fight, you can buy messages, tha: In flag fight, you can buy messages, that you can send to your opponent during the game.
In flag fight, you can buy profile custo: In flag fight, you can buy profile customization. This is characterized by 3 things, being able to buy a banner, a GIF profl photo and a GIF banner.
The home is the place where you can easi: The home is the place where you can easily navigate between the different pages.
Here are all the pages you can go to:: Here are all the pages you can go to:
Ranked games are games where the ELO (yo: Ranked games are games where the ELO (your level) is important. In ranked games, you will play with people of your level, the questions will be more adapted to your level.
Quick games, are games without pressure,: Quick games, are games without pressure, where losing does not affect your ELO. You can run into any type of player.
Training, is a single player mode, where: Training, is a single player mode, where you can train on any flag with very precise criteria, for a personalized learning while having fun!
The leaderboard, is the place where you: The leaderboard, is the place where you can see the ranking of everyone. You can filter the leaderboard by country, and even have a leaderboard that ranks the countries with the most ELO
In collection, you can see all the items: In collection, you can see all the items in the shop (also accessible from the shop), and you can filter them by the ones you have, and the ones you don't have.
History is where you can see the history: History is where you can see the history of the games you have had.
In the friend category, you can manage e: In the friend category, you can manage everything related to your friends or your notifications.
There is 4 things you can do:: There is 4 things you can do:
You can add a user as a friend by it's n: You can add a user as a friend by it's name.
You can see all the notifications you ha: You can see all the notifications you have received and interact with them if it is not too late
You can interact with your friends, invi: You can interact with your friends, inviting them to play with you (as it is possible to play with your friends by inviting them, however you will not earn coins), you can also remove them from your friends.
You also have a tab specifically for man: You also have a tab specifically for managing friend requests that you have received. You can either accept or decline them.
In the profile category, you can see you: In the profile category, you can see your profile, and an overview of some quick data.
When you click on someone's name (like a: When you click on someone's name (like a friend), the page will have the same format.
Flag Fight is a game about flags!: Flag Fight is a game about flags!
